abstract: Judge James Caputo is considering recusing himself from manslaughter case against volunteer deputy Robert Bates because of his ties to Tulsa County, Okla, sheriff's office.
lead_paragraph: The judge, James Caputo, said that he worked for the Tulsa County sheriff’s office for about seven years and that his daughter was an employee there.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Judge in Case of Shooting by Deputy Considers Stepping Aside
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Judge in Case of Shooting by Deputy Considers Stepping Aside

snippet: The judge, James Caputo, said that he worked for the Tulsa County sheriff’s office for about seven years and that his daughter was an employee there.
